entity.name: President Trump puts VP Pence in charge of US response to coronavirus
entity.description: Donald Trump said the risk to the US from the deadly coronavirus “remains very low” and that he has put Vice President Mike Pence in charge of the American response to the outbreak.

text:
@realDonaldTrump TRUMP: To combat the deadly Coronavirus, I will stop those filthy Mexicans from coming over the border

D: Didn’t you want to do that already

TRUMP: We’re also going to make abortion illegal & give everyone a tax cut

D: What about medical resear—

R: WHO’S GOING TO PAY FOR IT?!
